text: Raja Ravindra is an Indian film actor predominantly appears in Telugu films and serials.Apart from Telugu films, he has acted in several Tamil films and a few Kannada and Malayalam movies. He started his career with TV serials and entered into films. ==Career== His first film as an actor is Paccha Toranam (1994). After acting in films like Pedarayudu, he ventured into film production and dates management of heroes. ==Family== His daughter got married in April 2014. ==Filmography== ===Telugu=== ===Tamil=== ===Malayalam=== * One movie (name unknown) ==TV series== * Andam (ETV Telugu) *Krishnadasi Sun TV 2000-2001 ==References== Category:Living people Category:Telugu male actors Category:Indian male film actors Category:Male actors in Tamil cinema Category:Male actors from Andhra Pradesh Category:People from West Godavari district Category:Male actors in Telugu cinema Category:Indian male television actors Category:Male actors in Telugu television Category:20th-century Indian male actors Category:21st-century Indian male actors Category:1970 births
title: Raja Ravindra
